definitions.definition: Each of the patches of villi on the foetal chorion in the placenta of ruminants and some other mammals.
The leaf of the embryo of a seed - bearing plant ; after germination it becomes the first leaves of the seedling .

main_definition: ( physiology ) Each of the patches of villi on the foetal chorion in the placenta of ruminants and some other mammals.
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) The leaf of the embryo of a seed - bearing plant ; after germination it becomes the first leaves of the seedling .
